com.fluidops.iwb.wiki
Class Wikimedia

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.wiki.Wikimedia

public class Wikimedia
extends java.lang.Object

This class parses Wikimedia page content and extracts semantic statements.

Author:
Uli, pha

Nested Class Summary
static class Wikimedia.LookupConfig
          Configuration for replacing variables in templates, for each $this.property[resolver]$ there is exactly one config.

extractProperties

public static void extractProperties(java.util.ArrayList<Wikimedia.LookupConfig> properties,
                                     java.lang.String ret,
                                     java.lang.String pattern,
                                     boolean outgoing)
All properties are extracted of a String, i.e. a template

Parameters:
properties - An ArrayList that is filled with (uniquely) extracted configurations, which match the specified pattern
ret - The content String, i.e. the template
pattern - The pattern to be matched
outgoing - if true=>outgoing edge, if false=>incoming edge
